product_description: Mushroom nootropic strips that dissolve on the tongue for fast-acting focus and mental clarity. Key ingredients: L-Theanine, Lion's Mane, Cordyceps, and Shiitake. Designed for people who need to lock in and get work done — no pills, no powders, no waiting. Just place a strip on your tongue and go. Each pack is a 30-day supply.

competitor_info: MUDWTR (market leader, $40-60, powder, 'coffee alternative' positioning, big on ritual/lifestyle). Four Sigmatic (OG mushroom brand, $15-40, coffee/elixir format, 'think clearly' messaging). Onnit Alpha Brain (premium nootropic, $35-80, capsules, Joe Rogan endorsement, 'total human optimization'). Thesis (personalized nootropics, $79/mo, capsules, quiz-based customization). Magic Mind (liquid shot, $55/mo, 'productivity drink', Silicon Valley branding). Most competitors lead with 'focus' or 'clarity' — heavy on productivity lifestyle imagery. Common hooks: morning routine content, 'what I take before work' UGC, before/after productivity comparisons. Strip format is unique — nobody else in the space is doing dissolve-on-tongue delivery.
landing_page_info: Hero: 'Lock in. No pills. No powder. Just focus.' Subhead: 'Mushroom nootropic strips with Lion's Mane, Cordyceps, L-Theanine & Shiitake — dissolves on your tongue in seconds.' Social proof bar: '10,000+ strips sold, 4.6 stars.' Benefits section: sharper focus, sustained energy without crash, convenient strip format. How it works section: place strip on tongue → ingredients absorb fast → feel locked in within minutes. Offer: subscribe & save, 30-day money-back guarantee, free shipping.
additional_context: This is the brand's first paid social push. They've been selling organically via TikTok and Instagram for 4 months with strong retention (35% reorder rate). They want to scale to $30k/month ad spend within 3 months. Main concern: standing out in a crowded nootropics space and not getting flagged for health claims on Meta. The strip format is the key differentiator — it's novel, visual, and makes for great content.
